name: lime to generic market for soil pH raising agent | soil pH raising agent, as CaCO3 | Cutoff, U
description:
ecoQuery: https://ecoquery.ecoinvent.org/3.10/cutoff/dataset/14385/documentation

This is a linking activity which links the product "lime" to the generic market for soil pH raising agent. ; All products that enter this generic market provide the function of pH soil raising agent.;When there are no specific product attributes to be fulfilled, the generic market can beused. In the generic market the consumption of one product over another wil only be driven by best available price and not by the product attributes.
category: B:Mining and quarrying/08:Other mining and quarrying/089:Mining and quarrying n.e.c./0891:Mining of chemical and fertilizer minerals
